visual.name: relax
visual.title: Seeing is believing
visual.desc: You will never know until you try

visual.name: kids
visual.title: He that can have patience can have what he will
visual.desc: Liberty without learning is always in peril; learning without liberty is always in vain

visual.name: read
visual.title: Woe be to him that reads but one book
visual.desc: Live always in the best company when you read

visual.name: place
visual.title: Sincerity is the way of Heaven
visual.desc: That indolent but agreeable condition of doing nothing
